document.full_text: a former gang member was sentenced to life in prison on thursday for the 2007 schoolyard murders of three college-bound students, one of whom he hacked at with a machete before shooting her.
document.title: man gets life behind bars for grisly newark school slayings
lines_and_colors: a former gang member was sentenced to life in prison on thursday for the 2007 schoolyard murders of three college-bound students, one of whom he hacked at with a machete before shooting her.
